item.title: Statistics and Graphs: The Basics
item.description: Introduction Information vs Data Watch out for misleading data Frequency Pie Chart Bar Chart Stacked Split Histograms Differences? Calculating dimensions Frequency Density? Line Graphs Introduction I started learning about statistics because I found myself doing a lot of operational monitoring (i.e. making systems more observable, instrumenting individual services, and monitoring that data via custom built dashboards). Although, for the most part, everything worked as expected and I generally understood the data I was seeing visualised, I wanted to be sure I wasn’t missing any important information (or worse, mis-representing the data).
